application

Interface DonationManagerInterface

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DonationManager

    public interface DonationManagerInterface
    DonationManagerInterface class simulates the operation of adding a new package to the container stack, adding a new volunteer to the volunteer line, adding a new recipient to the recipient line and donating a package from the container by the volunteer to the recipient.
    Author:
    khandan Monshi, revised by Professor Kartchner

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int donatePackage()
      Simulates donating a DonationPackage from the container stack by the volunteer from the volunteer queue line to the recipients from the recipients queue line.
      DonationPackage[] managerArrayPackage()
      Returns an array of DonationPackages
      Recipient[] managerArrayRecipient()
      Returns an array of Recipients
      Volunteer[] managerArrayVolunteer()
      Returns an array of Volunteers
      boolean managerLoadContainer(DonationPackage dPackage)
      Stacks a new donation package in to the container
      boolean managerQueueRecipient(Recipient r)
      adds a new Recipient to the queue of the Recipient line
      boolean managerQueueVolunteer(Volunteer v)
      adds a new Volunteer to the volunteer line Queue

    • Method Detail

      • managerLoadContainer

        boolean managerLoadContainer(DonationPackage dPackage)
                      throws ContainerException
        Stacks a new donation package in to the container
        Parameters:
        dPackage - Donation package that is stacked to the container Return true if the package is stacked, false if the container is full
        Throws:
        ContainerException - if container is full

      • managerQueueVolunteer

        boolean managerQueueVolunteer(Volunteer v)
                       throws VolunteerException
        adds a new Volunteer to the volunteer line Queue
        Parameters:
        v - A Volunteer object
        Returns:
        true if volunteer is queued successfully
        Throws:
        VolunteerException("Volunteer - Line is full") if the Volunteer Line queue is full
        VolunteerException

      • managerQueueRecipient

        boolean managerQueueRecipient(Recipient r)
                       throws RecipientException
        adds a new Recipient to the queue of the Recipient line
        Parameters:
        rc - a Recipient
        Returns:
        true if recipient is queued successfully , false if queue is full
        Throws:
        RecipientException("Recipient - Line is full") if the Recipient line is full
        RecipientException

      • donatePackage

        int donatePackage()
           throws VolunteerException,
                  ContainerException,
                  RecipientException
        Simulates donating a DonationPackage from the container stack by the volunteer from the volunteer queue line to the recipients from the recipients queue line. As a result the package is removed from the container, volunteer will be dequeued from volunteer line and QUEUED BACK to the volunteer line and recipient will be dequeued from the recipient line.
        Throws:
        VolunteerException("Volunteer - Queue is empty") if there are no volunteers
        ContainerExcpetion("Contain - is empty") if the container is empty
        RecipientException("Recipient - Queue is empty") if there are no recipients
        VolunteerException
        ContainerException
        RecipientException

      • managerArrayPackage

        Returns an array of DonationPackages

        an array of Donation Packages
